name: my-eth-will
description:
boilerplate for starting ethereum dapp with react truffle and metamask

You need to have truffle installed


npm install -g truffle

open a terminal in the project root directory and write

truffle develop

copy the Mnemonic and import it to your metamask make sure you are on the localhost network

in the develop console write

migrate

In new terminal

cd client
npm install
npm start
